pkgmetadata.longdescription: Serbian Bible: Vuk Stefanović Karadžić translated the New Testament in 1847, and Đuro Daničić finished his translation of the Old Testament in 1865. This Bible translation is a public domain. ,"Biblija Srpski prevod. Vuk Stefanović Karadžić Novi Zakon 1847, Đuro Daničić Stari Zakon 1865."
